[AbeloHost](https://abelohost.com) is a high-quality offshore hosting provider registered in and operating from the Netherlands. All hardware is privately owned. By hosting on our servers you will benefit from increased performance, greater security, fast support and exclusive use of the servers system and network resources. Our pledge is to provide our customers with nothing but the best-quality and the most fully-featured services at reasonable prices.

••••••••••**Standard (SSD KVM PRO)**••••••••••

Use coupon: 15offrecurring

- 1GB RAM Memory
- Intel Xeon E5-2650 v2 @ 2.60GHz (1 Core)
- 15GB SSD (RAID 10)
- 1 IP Address (2 extra)
- Unmetered Traffic / 1Gbit Port (100mbps guaranteed)
- Weekly automatic backup
- Windows compatible
- 6.36 EUR (6.95 US Dollar) | No long term contracts

[Order VPS](https://bill.abelohost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=125)

**OS installation available for SSD KVM VPS Pro v1**: CentOS 6.5 x86_64, CentOS 6.5 x86_64 Minimal, CentOS 7.0 1406 x86_64 Minimal, Debian 7.3.0 x86_64 Minimal, Ubuntu 14.04 x86_64 Server Minimal


**Acceptable use policy:** https://abelohost.com/acceptable-use-policy/
